metadata.title: CVE-2021-43337 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: SchedMD Slurm 21.08.* before 21.08.4 has Incorrect Access Control. On sites using the new AccountingStoreFlags=job_script and/or job_env options, the access control rules in SlurmDBD may permit users to request job scripts and environment files to which they should not have access.

criterions.comment: slurm-wlm package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
